A bet is a bet and I’m a man of my word. This week @RepArmstrongND dropped off Thundar and Dakota our new office goldfish. I look forward to gifting my friend from North Dakota a pet named Duke next year. Congrats to @JMUFootball & NDSU on hard-fought seasons. #FCSChampionship https://t.co/ElBZvCFqGc

It was an honor to attend yesterday’s naturalization ceremony in Roanoke. I congratulate the 38 new Americans who took the Oath of Citizenship and wish them the very best on their journey toward achieving the American Dream. https://t.co/EKUWXfYSR9

With the Senate's approval of the United States-Mexico-Canada Trade Agreement the deal is heading to @realDonaldTrump’s desk. USMCA is a big win for American workers manufacturers and farmers and is expected to create 176K new jobs and add nearly $68B to the U.S. Economy. https://t.co/o9F6LCMZlR

On this day in 1786 the Virginia legislature adopted Thomas Jefferson’s Statute for Religious Freedom inspiring the framers of the U.S. Constitution. Today we celebrate the right of all Americans to freely exercise their faiths. #NationalReligiousFreedomDay https://t.co/LE7D1uG1a2

Tune in shortly to The @EveningEdit on @FoxBusiness. I’ll be discussing the Speaker’s delay in sending the Articles of Impeachment to the Senate.

It has been a busy week in DC but my thoughts are always with VA-06. Go Dukes! https://t.co/ymhsFxf6hl

@AJFriedenberger @RTDSchapiro Yikes. Hope they get back on track tomorrow. But it's still better than the scene we've got up here in DC. Ridiculous.
@RTDSchapiro @AJFriedenberger Wait...the House didn't adopt rules today? Has that ever happened before?

Our prayers are with my friends in the @VaHouse & @VaSenate as the 2020 session convenes today. May God grant them the wisdom and vision to make the best decisions for our Commonwealth and its citizens. Special congrats to @EFillerCorn on her election as the first female Speaker.
